title.value: Морфофункциональная организация двенадцатиперстной кишки телят с разной степенью физиологической зрелости при рождении
Duodenum morphological and functional organization of calves with a different degree of a physiological maturity at a birth
Duodenum morphological and functional organization of calves with a different degree of a physiological maturity at a birth

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Kharitonik, D.N., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: Tissue components of duodenum-wall at newborns calves with different degree of a physiological maturity undergo to some morphological and functional changes connected with reorganization of the structural organization. Results of studying of the morphological, morphometrical and functional features of a duodenum of newborns calves with different degree of a physiological maturity at the birth are given in the in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. Features of a structure and functioning of cytological structures of a mucous membrane, muscular and serous are given. The degree of development of cytological structures, such as fibers, crypts, duodenal glands and epithelial layer as a whole depends on a degree of a physiological maturity at a birth. Scientific and production researches were carried out in 2010 - 2011 in SPK 'Grodnenskij' (Grodno district), SPK 'Dembrovo' (Shchuchinskij district) and SRL of the 'Grodno State Agrarian University'.
